backend/main.mo: Primary LandCanister Motoko code defining land data structures, user profiles, modifiers, caches, and core logic utilities.
CANISTER_REINSTALL_GUIDE.md: Instructions for performing a full reinstall and re-initialization of Land and Asset canisters on IC mainnet, including prerequisites and backup steps.
DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md: High-level checklist for preparing environment variables and configuration before deploying the CyberGenesis app.
DEPLOYMENT_GUIDE.md: Step-by-step guide for deploying the full CyberGenesis Land Mint DApp to IC mainnet, including canister and asset preparation.
DEPLOYMENT_INSTRUCTIONS.md: Brief deployment instructions emphasizing correct canister deployment order and environment configuration.
DEVELOPER_README.md: Developer documentation describing the DApp architecture, multi-canister system, and core components of CyberGenesis.
ENVIRONMENT_CONFIGURATION.md: Guide outlining required frontend environment variables for proper network and canister configuration.
ENVIRONMENT_SETUP.md: Setup guide covering environment configuration and backend canister deployment to resolve common initialization errors.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented frontend material and rendering updates with associated components and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Summaries of key frontend source files describing styling, components, animations, hooks, and rendering behaviors.
frontend/.env: Production IC mainnet environment configuration with finalized canister IDs, admin principal, and stability settings.
frontend/.env.example: Example environment file showing required variables for network, canisters, admin configuration, and debug options.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point loading the CyberGenesis frontend app and ensuring no-cache directives.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling identity, actor initialization, profile setup flow, and reinitialization UI states.
frontend/src/asset-backend.d.ts: TypeScript definitions for the asset backend canister including assets, profiles, roles, and API methods.
frontend/src/asset-backend.idl.ts: Candid IDL factory defining the asset canister service, including asset management, admin, access control, and profile functions.
frontend/src/backend.idl.ts: Candid IDL factory for the main backend canister covering land data, rewards, modifiers, roles, profiles, and HTTP transformations.
frontend/src/components/AdminGLBUpload.t: Admin tool for uploading GLB land models with authorization checks, canister health checks, and upload handling.
frontend/src/components/AdminPanel.tsx: Simple admin UI for checking asset canister health and uploading GLB files with validation and progress simulation.
frontend/src/components/AssetCanisterDia: Diagnostic panel running detailed tests on asset canister connectivity, permissions, queries, and cycle balance.
frontend/src/components/AssetCanisterRei: UI component to authorize an admin, run pre- and post-checks, and reinitialize the asset canister with step-by-step status updates.
frontend/src/components/CanisterDiagnost: Runs connectivity tests across gateways for canisters, generates health reports, and provides status and recommendations.
frontend/src/components/CanisterIDVerifi: Compares environment canister IDs with expected values and displays correctness indicators for each canister.
Validates required environment variables and displays blocking errors and warnings when configuration is incomplete.
frontend/src/components/CosmicBackground: Renders an animated 2D cosmic background with stars and nebula effects using a canvas element.
frontend/src/components/CubeVisualizatio: Three.js/React component rendering biome-based 3D scene with custom shaders, lighting sync, fog, and bloom effects.
frontend/src/components/CyberCube.tsx: Empty placeholder file exporting nothing; former 3D logic has been moved elsewhere.
frontend/src/components/DeploymentVerifi: UI component that checks canister health, displays status, refreshes periodically, and shows toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/Discovery.tsx: Handles loot cache discovery and processing, including cost checks, API calls, and UI state for loading and results.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary component that catches render errors and displays a styled fallback alert.
frontend/src/components/Governance.tsx: Implements staking, proposal creation, and voting flows using query hooks and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/LandDashboard.ts: Displays land data, rewards, cooldowns, modifiers, and admin tools with actions like claiming and upgrading plots.
frontend/src/components/LandModel.tsx: Loads and configures a GLTF land model with KTX2 textures, applying biome‑based emissive and PBR settings and updating materials on traversal.
frontend/src/components/LandSelector.tsx: UI card allowing users to navigate between lands, showing name, biome translation, and index.
frontend/src/components/Leaderboard.tsx: Fetches and displays a top‑10 land ranking with loading, error handling, and styled leaderboard entries.
frontend/src/components/MapView.tsx: Interactive canvas map with gestures, spring physics, and biome rendering, centered on the user’s land.
frontend/src/components/Marketplace.tsx: Marketplace UI handling listing filters, buying, listing, and cancelling items with mutations and dialogs.
Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/NetworkDiagnosti: Runs periodic health checks against the asset canister and displays connection status, latency, and uptime.
frontend/src/components/ParticleBackgrou: Renders an animated 2D canvas with moving particles and connecting lines, handling resize and cleanup.
frontend/src/components/PlotCustomizatio: Provides UI to edit a land plot's name and decoration URL, integrating update mutations.
frontend/src/components/PlugWalletButton: Displays Plug wallet status with connect/disconnect options and a dropdown when connected.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Form for creating a user profile by submitting a name to the backend.
frontend/src/components/Reinitialization: Full‑screen overlay showing connection retry progress, gateway info, and attempt progress bar.
frontend/src/components/ThreeErrorBounda: Error boundary that catches 3D rendering errors and displays a resettable fallback UI.
frontend/src/config/mainnet.ts: Mainnet configuration defining canister IDs, URLs, feature flags, and helpers for model URLs and validation.
Provides React context for Plug wallet connection, managing connect/disconnect, principal state, and actor creation.
frontend/src/data/modifierCatalog.ts: Exports a static placeholder list of planned modifiers with ids, names, rarity tiers, and asset URLs.
frontend/src/governance-backend.d.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces and result variants for governance backend calls, including proposals, votes, and staking.
frontend/src/governance-backend.idl.ts: Defines the Candid IDL factory for the governance backend, including records, variants, and service methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity and reinitializes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorReinitializer: Provides automatic actor reinitialization with retry logic, gateway rotation, state tracking, and user notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithInit.ts: Enhances actor usage with initialization tracking, timeouts, and polling backend readiness through multiple health checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssetActor.ts: Creates a resilient asset canister actor with environment validation, gateway health checks, retries, and automatic failover.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssetHealth.ts: Provides a hook that checks the asset canister’s /health endpoint with a delay and timeout to return healthy or error status.
frontend/src/hooks/useAssetUpload.ts: Implements GLB upload logic using Plug wallet authentication, reading files, converting bytes, and calling uploadLandModel.
frontend/src/hooks/useGovernanceActor.ts: Initializes a governance canister actor with Internet Identity, retries, timeout handling, and automatic gateway selection.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context and provider logic for login, identity persistence, and accessing authentication state.
frontend/src/hooks/useMarketplaceActor.t: Initializes a marketplace canister actor with Internet Identity, retries, timeout handling, and optimal gateway selection.
Provides reusable React Query mutation hooks for executing Plug Wallet transactions across token, marketplace, and governance canisters, including actor creation and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating land data, user profiles, token balances, and placeholder marketplace/governance types.
frontend/src/hooks/useTokenActor.ts: Initializes a token canister actor with retries, gateway failover, and timeout handling using Internet Identity credentials.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling with dark theme variables, neon effects, and custom fonts for the app UI.
frontend/src/lib/buildInfo.ts: Exposes build timestamp and version info and utilities for cache busting and logging build metadata.
frontend/src/lib/debugConfig.ts: Centralized debug utilities for 3D rendering, including logging, GPU diagnostics, renderer detection, and performance tracking.
frontend/src/lib/modelLoader.ts: Empty file or stub for future model loading utilities.
frontend/src/lib/tokenUtils.ts: Provides utilities to format and parse ICRC-1 token amounts and apply thousand separators.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/marketplace-backend.d.ts: Type definitions for the marketplace canister including listings, item types, and buy results.
frontend/src/marketplace-backend.idl.ts: Exports the Candid IDL factory for the marketplace canister service and data structures.
frontend/src/pages/Collection.tsx: Renders the modifier collection page with rarity counts and styled tier displays.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard managing tab navigation, land selection, and loading land data via actor queries.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page handling Internet Identity login with animated UI elements.
frontend/src/pages/MintingPage.tsx: Displays land minting initialization status and loading indicators.
frontend/src/pages/VerificationPage.tsx: Page for validating canister configuration IDs with a visual check component.
frontend/src/token-backend.d.ts: Type definitions for the token canister including accounts, transfers, metadata, and admin functions.
frontend/src/token-backend.idl.ts: Defines Candid IDL types and service methods for token operations like balance, transfer, metadata, total supply, and minting.
frontend/src/types/webgpu.d.ts: Provides TypeScript definitions for WebGPU interfaces to allow API usage and feature detection without errors.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from hashes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, animations, shadows, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite config enabling React, environment variables, WASM handling, build timestamping, aliases, and dev server proxy settings.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing emissive intensity fixes for LandModel.tsx with feature requests and architectural notes.
README_RUSSIAN.md: Russian-language deployment overview and quick start instructions for CyberGenesis.
scripts/upload_assets_mainnet.sh: Mainnet script uploading .glb assets to the AssetCanister with rate limiting and verification steps.
scripts/upload_assets.sh: Local script to batch‑upload tiered .glb model files to an AssetCanister using dfx.
unknown.txt: Contains a brief note referencing testing a health endpoint.
